original: the website for Tablet PC enthusiasts!
translated: 平板爱好者的网络家园！

original: Tablet PCs are the future. They have been the next big thing for 30 years! Tablet PCs work just like traditional pen and paper except they cost $2,000 and require electricity. They are heavier than a TV, more expensive than a laptop and come with a full 15 minutes of battery time. Who wants to use one of those fiddly little PDAs when you can lug a flat-screen monitor around on your back? Who wants to type 90 words a minute when you can spend twice as long writing them onto a computer screen with a digital pen and a system that doesn't recognize your handwriting? Why scrawl a girl's number on the back of a cigarette packet when you can impress her by taking ten minutes to boot up your electronic clipboard? Why type an email when you can convert it into meaningless gibberish with handwriting-recognition software?
translated: 平板电脑才是未来。它会成为未来30年最大的变革！平板电脑的功能和传统的纸笔一样，只是要花$2000，还需要供电。平板电脑比电视还重，比笔记本还贵，电池续航只有15分钟。既然能背着一大块平板电视走了，谁还会需要麻烦的小型PDA？既然能用手写笔和手写不识别系统输入了，谁还会花上更短的时间往电脑上打字？既然能花十分钟启动你的电子记事本，给姑娘留下深刻印象，何必把人家的电话记在香烟盒子上？既然识别软件能把手写笔记转换成狗屁不通的乱码，何必用键盘手敲邮件？

original: Every few years, Facade and Fruit unveil a new pen computer, and every time, it tanks in the marketplace. What is wrong with people? What is the fascination with a 19th century typewriter keyboard? QWERTY EATS ASS! Since when did cost, size, speed and efficiency become such driving factors for modern consumers? Don't they want to draw funny pictures and send them to their friends? We are tired of hearing that digital writing is dead! This is a call to arms! The Tablet PC community has been ridiculed for too long! Make a stand against the QWERTY luddites! Spread the word! Write through the hand cramps!
translated: 每隔几年，巨硬和水果都会发布一款新的手写电脑，每一次都会在市场上失败。现代人是怎么回事？19世纪的打字机键盘有什么魅力吗？QWERTY布局吃屎去吧！什么时候开始，价格、尺寸、速度和性能成了消费者考虑的主要因素了？他们就不想画几张有趣的图片，发给朋友吗？手写已死这句话我们早听腻了！平板爱好者联合起来！平板电脑社群被嘲笑了太久了！站出来反抗QWERTY顽固派！向世界发声！用手书写！

original: Send a message to EWT from your Tablet PC!
translated: 用平板电脑向我们EWT发送信息吧！

original: "I dove my net Target AC! I hosed do wring my grubby gash on a crap of pauper bull now I wriggle it one me orbital toboggan and pull it off at the store. Penetrating! Keep me roasted with the latest tables!"
translated: 「我受死这台欣买的Target AC平版了！议前我在破拦纸片上写字，但星现在我可以拿于写笔写字，左店里大好用了。太牛了！以后一定要证我贝识到最新款乎板！」

original: "I am very ashamed to admit that I am writing this message from a TW@ internet cafe. I seem to have lost the cordless pen for my Panoramic HeavyPad, rendering the device totally useless! Has anyone got a spare? Nobody makes them any more!!"
translated: 「很不想承认，但这条评论是在TW@网吧写的。我好像弄丢了全景牌HeavyPad平板的无线笔，结果平板完全没法用了！有人有多余的笔吗？对应的笔早就停产了！！」
